comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

comment.body: Проблема повторяется именно с включенным AdGuard и связана с блокировкой gwtlog. Этот url используется для сбора служебной информации по пользователям, в т.ч. по ленте. Если этот url заблокирован, лента не знает о том, что юзер просмотрел или нет. И по-этому будет упорно подсовывать один и тот же контент.

issue.title: m.blogtruyen.vn

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blogtruyen.vn/c620073/ichijou-san-wa-kao-ni-deyasui-chap-01

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, ABPVN List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I recommend the filter:
```adblockfilter
m.blogtruyen.vn##a[href^="https://www.i9bet"]
m.blogtruyen.vn##a[href^="https://i9bet"]
```

or a really powerful filter:
```adblockfilter
##a[href^="https://www.i9bet"]
##a[href^="https://i9bet"]
```

>> Note: The reason is because `i9` is an illegal gambling site it keeps changing the domain name `i9*` I have sent quite a lot of requests for the domain name `i9*` and it's really tiring to deal with it every time the domain name change


3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![Screenshot_20230127-164654_Chrome~2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/215057719-e37d92d2-bf83-4496-9f11-a9d19d1fd29e.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Принцип работы такой - если фид был просмотрен пользователем, он навсегда улетает из ленты и юзер его больше не увидит. Факт просмотра идёт через gwtlog. Если фид был отрисован (но не просмотрен), то его приоритет может понизиться, он может выпасть из ленты на какое-то время, но обязательно туда вернется опять.

issue.title: m.blogtruyen.vn
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blogtruyen.vn/c620073/ichijou-san-wa-kao-ni-deyasui-chap-01

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, ABPVN List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I recommend the filter:
```adblockfilter
m.blogtruyen.vn##a[href^="https://www.i9bet"]
m.blogtruyen.vn##a[href^="https://i9bet"]
```

or a really powerful filter:
```adblockfilter
a[href^="https://www.i9bet"]
a[href^="https://i9bet"]
```

>> Note: The reason is because `i9` is an illegal gambling site it keeps changing the domain name `i9*` I have sent quite a lot of requests for the domain name `i9*` and it's really tiring to deal with it every time the domain name change


3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![Screenshot_20230127-164654_Chrome~2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/215057719-e37d92d2-bf83-4496-9f11-a9d19d1fd29e.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: imdb.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0 with the latest version of filter_14_Annoyances

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Due to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141032

@MD-Box Possible reasons:
- server: https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query
- filters: https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt
- DnsUserRules

Please do following:
- switch to non-filtered AdGuard DNS server
- disable DNS user rules 
- disable all filters in AdBlocker menu
- stop that app
- clear filtering log
- reproduce an issue
- make screenshots of blocked requests (you may filter out processed requests using the menu in the top corner)

issue.title: imdb.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0 with the latest version of filter_14_Annoyances

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> При включении вырубаются живые обои расширения vkstyles

Проверьте в пользовательском фильтре:
`vk.com#@#[data-ad-cls]`
Расширение vkstyles отключает обои при обнаружении блокировщика.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.46.0 with the latest version of filter_14_Annoyances

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@Alex-302 ну вообще это я много раз сообщал, так как я активно использую сайт и действительно часто видел этот попап. Но к сообщению https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141032 я не имею никакого отношения, соответственно это проблема не у меня одного.

@zloyden так можно заблокировать раздражающий попап, который автоматически появляется при открытии страницы несколько раз в течение нескольких дней (о чём как раз сообщили в https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141032), но не блокировать попап, который вызывается пользователем?

### Prerequisites

Firefox

Desktop

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0105226/

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The following lines from `filter_14_Annoyances` are disabling the rate button (1st line) and messing with the margin when clicking the rate button (2nd line).

imdb.com#$#div[data-testid="promptable"] { display: none !important; }
imdb.com#$?#body { overflow: auto !important; }

Can be tested on any movie page on IMDB.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/im](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fim) ### Comment > Проблема заключается в том, что фильтр не распознает сайт vk.com в исключениях. При установленном VK Styles сайт был внесён в исключения для отображения анимированных обоев, но с сегодняшнего дня исключение не воспринимается сайтом как действительное, при установленном vk.com в исключениях VK не воспринимается как исключение и сайт указывает что, что ADGuard на нём продолжает работу, в связи с чем отображение рекламы и фон не работают. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/e3Zr6Xc.png)
